job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pWe are a leader in penetration testing and attack surface management NetSPI is constantly growing and looking for innovative minds to join us in helping some of the largest organizations in the world protect their technology and data from cyber criminals if you thrive in a collaborative setting and enjoy working with bestinclass technology  we want to meet youppThe Software Engineer will be responsible for working on and supporting our Red Team Toolkit Attack Simulation Red Team Toolkit is an offensive security platform and tooling suite for red teamers and penetration testersnbspThe toolkit enables teams to perform advanced network operations collaborate on target exploitation and better simulate sophisticated adversariesppbrppResponsibilitiespulliDesign code test and deploy application in an iterative development environmentliliDevelop code that is scalable robust and bugfreeliliDeliver high quality technical solutions to stakeholders in a fastpaced environmentliliDevelopment in accordance with industry standard and best practicesliliIdentify and analyze user requirements and convert them into a feasible technical documentliliWork with a geographically distributed team of various experience levelsliulpbrppRequired Skillspulli4 years of handson experience with CNETlili2 years of experience using ASPNET Corelili2 years of experience in consuming RESTSOAP serviceslili2 years of experience using Reactlili1 years of experience with relationalNoSQL databasesliliBachelors degree in Computer ScienceliulpbrppPreferred SkillspulliExperience using TypescriptliliExperience using C andor Win32 APIsliliExperience using WPFUWPWinUIliliOpensource contributionliliExperience working in Agile team environmentliliEffective communication skills both verbal and writtenliul
